name: i-Ctrl
0:
”Alexa, turn on air conditioner”
”Alexa, turn off light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
i-Ctrl Action lets you control your home devices remotely with an AIFA i-Ctrl. 

Currently supported devices and commands:
TV
SetTopBox
DVD
AUX
Light
Air conditioner
